directions: In a large pot, bring chicken broth, tomato sauce, and taco seasoning to a boil.
Stir rice into the pot, cover and remove from heat. Let the pot stand, covered, for 5 minutes.
Stir in cheese and olives; mix well. Serve with sour cream.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can black olives, drained and chopped
title: Taco Rice
